title: Suzannah Lipscomb on women’s lives in Reformation France
itunes:title: Suzannah Lipscomb on women’s lives in Reformation France
itunes:subtitle: Dr Suzannah Lipscomb talks to her fellow historian Dan Jones about her latest book, The Voices of Nîmes, which offers a fascinating window into sex and morality and the lives of women in 16th-century France. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Suzannah Lipscomb talks to Dan Jones about the lives of women in 16th-century France. Historyextra.com/podcast
